Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Helped provide continous feedback on work where i otherwise would not receive it.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: GenAI is very suggestible so I only trust it to give feedback on things that I can confirm myself. Because of this i trust GenAI feedback alot less.
